subject: Re: junit xml output
msgSnippet: Thank you all for your comments, it s been most helpful. Something I don t understand with jUnit is what is the conceptual difference between a failure and an
messageBody:
Thank you all for your comments, it's been most helpful.

Something I don't understand with jUnit is what is the conceptual
difference between a failure and an error, how would you describe them,
is one more serious than another ?, maybe another way to ask is what
would trigger an error, and what would trigger a failure?

Steve

> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Stephen George <steve_geo@...> wrote:
>
>> I've been searching the web over, but cannot find a reference guide to
>> junits xml output.
>>
>>
>
> I found this. Maybe it can help you along?
>

>
> Cheers,
> Ola
